title: Enhancing organic solar cells lifetime through humidity control using BCF in PM6:Y6 active layers
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00598H, Paper
Kaike Rosivan Maia Pacheco, João Paulo Araújo Souza, Marlus Koehler, Eswaran Jayaraman, Daniel Garcia Martos, Vida Turkovic, Morten Madsen, Lucimara S. Roman​
Enhancing the longevity of efficient organic solar cells (OSCs) remains a central focus in contemporary research. Many strategies have been explored, including material modifications in active layers, electrodes, interlayers, and...
